alert.note: Alert for Butts; Lamar; Monroe; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Spalding, north central Monroe, southwestern Butts and northern Lamar Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Orchard Hill, or near Griffin, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Jackson, Flovilla, Milner, Jenkinsburg, Orchard Hill, East Griffin, McKibben, Chappel Mill, High Falls State Park, Blount, Liberty Hill, and Indian Springs State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
